section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on December 24, 2021.*
section.heading: Tolling of tenant deadlines during a public health emergency.
section.text: The running of all time periods for tenants and tenant organizations to exercise rights under this chapter shall be tolled from the beginning of the period of a public health emergency declared pursuant to § 7-2304.01 until the end of the public health emergency, and for 30 days thereafter; except, that the time periods under § 42-3404.02(d) that are applicable to a Notice of Transfer for a transfer exempt under § 42-3404.02(c)(2)(O), (P) or (Q) shall not be tolled.
